name: Getting Over Goombas
description:
Getting Over Goombas 

The ultimate platforming challenge: the rage-inducing mechanics of Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy in the classic world of Super Mario Bros.

Control Mario's trusty hammer to navigate through a treacherous environment filled with Goombas and other iconic enemies. But don't be fooled by the familiar graphics - this game is anything but easy, one false move could send you tumbling back to the start.

Can you master the art of hammer-swinging and reach the flag pole in record time? Get ready to rage, Mario-style!

Controls 

Mouse-only.
